title: Litro has sufficient gas stocks for five days
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Litro Gas company says that it has enough stocks to continuously supply gas for the next five days.
However, from today (21), Litro stated that it will take steps to distribute 80,000 domestic cylinders.
Its Chairman, Vijitha Herath said that most of it, amounting to 60% will be distributed to Colombo and Gampaha Districts.
However, people in many areas were seen waiting in long queues even last night to obtain gas.
